name: Beat Your Meat (itch)
description:
Beat Your Meat is a idle/clicker game where you use a variety of tools to deal as much damage as possible to the meat. The more damage you do the more you are paid. Upgrade your tools/abilities to further increase damage. Further development your research in order to finally destroy the meat.

Features:

-18 Damaging abilities each with their own animations/sprites.

-Over a hundred hours of gameplay

-Ability to destroy the universe to get rid of the meat
